task.title: Change IVR Prompt Clip
task.shortdesc: If you need to change one audio clip in the IVR prompt frequently. You can divide your IVR prompt to multiple audio clips, and change the desired audio clip when you need to change the IVR prompt.

p.b: For example, your IVR prompt is like the following:

context.p: " Thank you for calling Yeastar. We are currently closed in observance of Holiday Name. We will return on Date. If you got something urgent, please press 1 to contact our support. To leave a voicemail, please press 2."
The second sentence is what your would change frequently. You can divide the IVR prompt to 3 clips.

ul.li: Clip 1: Thank you for calling Yeastar.
Clip 2: We are currently closed in observance of Holiday Name. We will return on Date
Clip 3: If you got something urgent, please press 1 to contact our support. To leave a voicemail, please press 2.

step.cmd: Go to Settings PBX Voice Prompts Custom Prompts , click Upload to upload your IVR prompt clips.
Go to Settings PBX Call Features IVR , edit your IVR.
Select the Prompt to the IVR prompt clip1.
Click , and select the Prompt to your IVR prompt clip2.
Click , and select the Prompt to your IVR prompt clip3.

taskbody.result: Next time, when you want to change the IVR prompt, you can change the desired prompt clip instead of changing the whole IVR prompt.
